welcome_message_body: Welcome to Al Juwayyidah, a charming city known for its rich history, friendly locals, and breathtaking scenery. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marka International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Marka International Airport caters to high-end travelers and offers exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Queen Alia International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for charter flights and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Limited free access, additional time can be purchased.
